      • RequestSrv

        public RequestSrv()

    • Method Detail

      • setLock

        public static void setLock(boolean lock)
        Sets the service layer's underlying data store locking policy.
        Parameters:
        lock - if set to true, individual underlying data stores will be locked upon access.

      • create

        public static RequestDao create(java.lang.String hash,
                                java.lang.String deviceName,
                                java.lang.String interfaceIP,
                                java.lang.String interfaceMAC,
                                java.lang.String osVersion,
                                java.lang.String nmapVersion)
                         throws SrvException
        Creates a request using the specified data and returns an object representing it.
        Parameters:
        hash - the agent's hash value.
        deviceName - the agent's device name.
        interfaceIP - the agent's interface IP address.
        interfaceMAC - the agent's interface MAC address.
        osVersion - the agent's operating system version.
        nmapVersion - the agent's nmap version.
        Returns:
        the created request object containing its generated id, or null if the request was not found after creating it.
        Throws:
        SrvException - if a request already exists with specified hash, the request could not be created, or a data access error occurs.

      • findById

        public static RequestDao findById(long requestId)
                           throws SrvException
        Retrieves the request with specified id.
        Parameters:
        requestId - the request's id.
        Returns:
        the request found or null if a request with specified id was not found.
        Throws:
        SrvException - if a data access error occurs.

      • findByHash

        public static RequestDao findByHash(java.lang.String hash)
                             throws SrvException
        Retrieves the request with specified id.
        Parameters:
        hash - the request's hash.
        Returns:
        the request found or null if a request with specified hash was not found.
        Throws:
        SrvException - if a data access error occurs.

      • findAllWithStatus

        public static java.util.Set<RequestDao> findAllWithStatus(RequestStatus requestStatus)
                                                   throws SrvException
        Retrieves all requests that have a specific status.
        Parameters:
        requestStatus - status of the requests.
        Returns:
        a set of objects, each representing a request.
        Throws:
        SrvException - if a data access error occurs.

      • reject

        public static void reject(long requestId,
                          long adminId)
                   throws SrvException
        Changes a request's status to rejected.
        Parameters:
        requestId - the request's id.
        adminId - id of the admin rejecting the request.
        Throws:
        SrvException - if request id or admin id are invalid, request is already rejected, admin is not logged in, status could not be set, or a data access error occurs.

      • pending

        public static void pending(long requestId,
                           long adminId)
                    throws SrvException
        Changes a request's status to pending.
        Parameters:
        requestId - the request's id.
        adminId - the admin setting the request's status to pending.
        Throws:
        SrvException - if request id or admin id are invalid, request is already pending, admin is not logged in, status could not be set, or a data access error occurs.

      • updateTimeReceived

        public static void updateTimeReceived(long requestId)
                               throws SrvException
        Sets a request's received time to the current time.
        Parameters:
        requestId - the request's id
        Throws:
        SrvException - if a request with specified id does not exist, its received time could not be set, or a data access error occurs.
